attributes.action: State Funeral for Lee Rigby 2nd Battalion Royal Fusiliers
attributes.additional_details:
State Funeral for Lee Rigby 2nd Battalion Royal Fusiliers
Lee was a Hero and should be treated as one.
Savagely murdered on the streets of London.
He served his country with Honour and gave his life to this country.
This country should be able to pay its respects in the highest order!
A State Funeral for a Hero!
